notes.placementRule: placement tells you where to put the first name relative to the line

placements.suffix: Render as: `${line}, ${firstName}.` (or just append the name with punctuation)
placements.inline: Line already contains `{name}` token. Replace it.
placements.none: No name needed for this one

lines.text: Welcome back, {name}. The jobs missed you.
Welcome back. The backlog is still undefeated, but we can change that.
{name} detected. Deploying mild chaos.
Good morning. Or whatever time it is. Let’s find you a job.
Welcome back, {name}. Same jobs. New ambition.
Alright. Let’s pretend we’re excited to be here. It’s more fun that way.
Hi {name}. Your future self asked me to keep you honest.
The pipeline is quiet. Suspiciously quiet.
Welcome back, {name}. Try not to break the ATS today. It’s sensitive.
Let’s find a job where “we’re a family” means we leave at 5.
Nice of you to show up, {name}. The jobs didn’t apply to themselves. Unfortunately.
We go again. With feelings. And also jobs.
Welcome back, {name}. I saved you a fresh batch of jobs. You’re welcome.
Somewhere, a recruiter is about to misread your title.
Hey {name}. Let’s turn applied into done. Or at least applied into less sad.
If you’re here, you’re either ambitious or avoiding something. Let’s assume the former.
Welcome back, {name}. Time to bully the backlog (respectfully).
No meetings here. Just you, the jobs, and your existential dread. Let’s go.
You’ve returned, {name}. The system approves. Barely.
Your dream job doesn’t exist. But one that pays the bills does. Let’s find it.
Welcome back, {name}. Today we choose now over later. Again.
I found more jobs. You’re welcome. I’m sorry.
Hi {name}. Your keyboard missed the violence.
Time to turn browsing into outcomes.
Welcome back, {name}. Please do not feed the procrastination gremlin.
New day. Same mission. Let’s get it.
Alright {name}. Pick a job and make it nervous.
Your to do list called. It sounded stressed.
Welcome back, {name}. Jobs are like buses. Miss one, and another will come. But let’s not miss this one.
If it’s not tracked, it didn’t happen.
Hey {name}. We’re doing the sensible thing today. Applying to jobs.
You have jobs. You have time. You have questionable optimism.
Welcome back, {name}. Make the ATS regret its life choices.
Apply. Get auto rejected. Build character. Repeat.
Good to see you, {name}. Let’s turn Ready into Hired.
You can’t pay rent with exposure. Let’s go.
Welcome back, {name}. Fresh opportunities and mild dread.
A clean inbox is a problem, let’s get to work.
Hi {name}. Your next offer is hiding behind consistency.
Cover letters are dead. Let’s write one anyway, for the love of the game.
Welcome back, {name}. Light chaos. Heavy output.
I checked. The jobs are still out there being jobs.
Okay {name}. No drama. Just execution.
If you’re waiting for motivation, you’ll be waiting a while.
Welcome back, {name}. Increase your snacks today, just because.
The ATS isn’t going to confuse itself. Get in there.
Hey {name}. I’m rooting for you. Quietly. Like a normal app.
Job search mode is on. Feelings are optional.
Welcome back, {name}. Your 'later' has arrived.
Let’s be annoyingly consistent. It works. You know it works. Let’s do it.
Hi {name}. I’d say take your time but I’d be lying, so let’s not.
I’ve seen your screen time. Let’s focus on the job board.
Welcome back, {name}. Turn effort into results.
Somewhere, an ATS is preparing to be unimpressed.
Hey {name}. Apply like you mean it.
Your dream job is out there. But so are a lot of other jobs. Let’s find one that’s real.
Welcome back, {name}. Minimal drama. Maximum output.
Today’s vibe is avoiding the phrase 'fast paced environment'.
Alright {name}. Let’s make the algorithm regret ignoring you.
Your calendar is empty. That means we apply, not scroll.
Welcome back, {name}. The pipeline yearns for activity.
Open the job. Read it. Actually read it.
Hi {name}. Your next win is one follow up away.
If the job description asks for a rockstar, run.
Welcome back, {name}. jobops believes in you more than you do.
We’re not here to vibe. We’re here to convert.
Hey {name}. You’ve got this. And if you don’t, you’ve got this.
Stop refreshing your inbox. It’s been four seconds.
Welcome back, {name}. The Ready tab is feeling ignored.
Perfection is the enemy of good enough to get an interview.
Welcome back, {name}. You’re one good week from a different life.
I brought jobs. You bring focus. Deal.
Hi {name}. Overthinking won’t write your cover letter.
A recruiter somewhere just typed ninja. Stay strong.
Welcome back, {name}. This is where the luck gets manufactured.
